import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import UserImg from "../../Assests/Images/user/sha.jpeg"; import { FcCamera, FcVideoCall } from "react-icons/fc"; import { BsXCircleFill } from "react-icons/bs"; function CreatePost() { const [selectedImage, setSelectedImage] = useState(); // This function will be triggered when the file field change const imageChange = (e) => { if (e.target.files && e.target.files.length > 0) { setSelectedImage(e.target.files[0]); } }; const removeSelectedImage = () => { setSelectedImage(); }; return (
{selectedImage && (
)} Photos Videos
); } export default CreatePost;
